Tadaa, ANOVA!

Tadaa, ANOVA!

tadaa_aov(formula, data = NULL, show_effect_size = TRUE, factorize = TRUE,
  type = 1, print = "df")

Arguments

formula

Formula for model, passed to aov.
data

Data for model.
show_effect_size

If TRUE (default), effect sizes partial eta^2 and Cohen's f are appended as columns.
factorize

If TRUE (default), non-factor independent variables will automatically converted via as.factor, so beware of your inputs.
type

Which type of SS to use. Default is 1, can also be 2 oder 3.
print

Print method, per default a regular data.frame. Otherwise passed to sprinkle_print_method for fancyness.

Value

A data.frame by default, otherwise dust object, depending on print.

See also

Other Tadaa-functions: tadaa_kruskal, tadaa_nom, tadaa_normtest, tadaa_one_sample, tadaa_ord, tadaa_pairwise_gh, tadaa_pairwise_tukey, tadaa_pairwise_t, tadaa_t.test, tadaa_wilcoxon

Examples

tadaa_aov(stunzahl ~ jahrgang, data = ngo)
#>        term  df     sumsq    meansq statistic     p.value    eta.sq eta.sq.part
#> 1  jahrgang   2  543.4317 271.71587  26.94306 2.62655e-11 0.1796886   0.1796886
#> 2 Residuals 246 2480.8655  10.08482        NA          NA        NA          NA
#>   cohens.f
#> 1 0.468027
#> 2       NA
tadaa_aov(stunzahl ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo)
#>              term  df        sumsq       meansq    statistic      p.value
#> 1          geschl   1 8.497142e-03 8.497142e-03 8.652286e-04 9.765579e-01
#> 2        jahrgang   2 5.434317e+02 2.717159e+02 2.766770e+01 1.494624e-11
#> 3 jahrgang:geschl   2 9.442920e+01 4.721460e+01 4.807666e+00 8.959998e-03
#> 4       Residuals 243 2.386428e+03 9.820690e+00           NA           NA
#>         eta.sq  eta.sq.part    cohens.f
#> 1 2.809625e-06 3.560599e-06 0.001886958
#> 2 1.796886e-01 1.854805e-01 0.477197711
#> 3 3.122352e-02 3.806314e-02 0.198920258
#> 4           NA           NA          NA

# Other types of sums
tadaa_aov(stunzahl ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo, type = 2, print = "console")
#> Table 3: **ANOVA using Type II Sum of Squares**
#> 
#>              Term       SS      MS  df      F       p $\\eta^2$
#> 1          geschl    0.008   0.008   1  0.001    0.98         0
#> 2        jahrgang  543.418 271.709   2 27.667 < 0.001      0.18
#> 3 jahrgang:geschl   94.429  47.215   2  4.808  < 0.01     0.031
#> 4       Residuals 2386.428   9.821 243   <NA>    <NA>      <NA>
#>   $\\eta_\\text{part}^2$ Cohen's f
#> 1                      0     0.002
#> 2                  0.185     0.477
#> 3                  0.038     0.199
#> 4                   <NA>      <NA>
#> 
#> 
tadaa_aov(stunzahl ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo, type = 3, print = "console")
#> Table 4: **ANOVA using Type III Sum of Squares**
#> 
#>              Term       SS     MS  df     F      p $\\eta^2$
#> 1          geschl    8.495  8.495   1 0.865   0.35     0.003
#> 2        jahrgang  101.159  50.58   2  5.15 < 0.01     0.033
#> 3 jahrgang:geschl   94.429 47.215   2 4.808 < 0.01     0.031
#> 4       Residuals 2386.428  9.821 243  <NA>   <NA>      <NA>
#>   $\\eta_\\text{part}^2$ Cohen's f
#> 1                  0.004      0.06
#> 2                  0.041     0.206
#> 3                  0.038     0.199
#> 4                   <NA>      <NA>
#> 
#>
